0.1.name: wordpress/wedos-news
0.1.description:
Features

  • News, information and discount code from WEDOS.com RSS feed
  • News, information and discount code from Google+ stream.
  • Graph of daily traffic
  • Quick links to online customer chat support, help and forum
  • Quick links for ordering new domains, hosting or FTP drive
  • No affiliate links, no ads
  • No settings

This plugin is not an official plugin WEDOS corporation!
